text: Rafael Yerney Pinillo Ocoró is the partner of Francia Márquez, the 13th Vice President of Colombia. He studied law in the Pontifical Xaverian University and served as Second Gentleman of Colombia since 2022 as the second men in the role Pinillo is the first not married with the incumbet vice president and the first Afrocolombian. As the second gentleman he has a protagonic role, travel and companied the vice president when the spouses are a private figures. ==References== Category:Date of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:1980s births Category:Colombian lawyers Category:People from Cali
title: Yerney Pinillo
